Safa One

Safa Park, with Downtown Burj Khalifa and Business Bay in the background

DAMAC Safa One is a tropical paradise at the pinnacle of luxurious opening onto breathtaking views as far as the eye can see. Be it the refinement of a 1 bedroom home in Tower B or an ultra-luxurious 2 or 3 bedroom suite with personal splash pool, Safa One sets a new great standard in sophistication

2

3

Safa One

download the brochure

DAMAC Safa One de GRISOGONO The Skylofts Collection

DAMAC Properties presents The Skylofts Collection in its flagship development Safa One. That being said, potential real estate buyers are provided with the opportunity of picking their dream home from the selection of beautifully crafted 2-5 bedroom duplexes. The exquisite residences will be constructed on the 40th to 61st floors of the branded skyscraper and homeowners will be granted unrestricted access to a tropical garden and a rainforest on the top level, in addition to a man-made beach pool on the podium floor.

Safa One was initially launched back in Q1 2022 in collaboration with the Swiss jewelry brand de GRISOGONO. Among key features of the development, which is due in 2026, are garden terraces on every level, cascading waterfalls, plentiful gardens, exotic birds and much more. It is worth noting that in line with the latest UAE visa overhaul, when purchasing an off-plan property priced at a minimum of AED 2M, you become eligible for a 10-year Golden Visa. This residency scheme enables its holders to live, work and study in the UAE without local sponsorship, along with their families and domestic staff.

Dubai canal

2

2

Cavalli Couture

download the brochure

DAMAC Cavalli Couture, which is designed by the legendary fashion house of Roberto Cavalli, is a new uber-elite project, combining the elements of the jungle and water, and is located on the banks of the Dubai Water Canal.

Among the units on offer for sale in this 12-storey building are 3-4 bedroom apartments showcasing high-end design at every turn, with floor plan areas from 4,300 sqft, as well as more spacious 5-bedroom duplexes with a living area from 8,750 sqft. The number of super-luxury residences is limited to just 70, and each one will face the Dubai Water Canal.

Residents will also be offered a range of top-notch amenities, located on the territory of the building or just around the corner, which will allow residents to soak up the vibrant and tranquil lifestyle. On the top of the building a swimming pool and a lounge zone, where residents can enjoy exclusive dishes from a chef can be found. In addition, Cavalli Couture by DAMAC Properties is one of the latest projects, which will offer waterfront views of the canal.

3

DAMAC Elegance Towerance Tower in Downtown Dubai

download the brochure

Elegance Tower is a new premium residential project, which will be located in Downtown Dubai, steps away from The Dubai Mall. The developer of this stunning skyscraper is DAMAC, which is known for such projects as DAMAC Lagoons, DAMAC Hills and fashionable Cavalli Tower. Future residents of DAMAC Elegance Tower can choose from stylish 1-2 bedroom apartments with exciting views of Dubai Downtown and surroundings. There is also an opportunity to purchase a full floor. Among the key amenities which will be available to those living in Elegance Tower is a swimming pool with a deck and a garden, located on a podium of the building.

Purchasing an apartment in Elegance Tower is a profitable investment into your future, as you will get an opportunity to experience a premium lifestyle in Downtown Dubai with access to endless amenities, F&B and shopping options, as well as entertainment activities. In addition, you will always be able to resell a property after the completion or rent it out, as the average ROI for a 1-bedroom apartment in the area is 6.7%.

2

3

The Cove

download the brochure

The Cove Apartments by Emaar Properties is a prominent, waterfront, residential complex located within Dubai Creek Harbour. The complex offers 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments with exceptional views of Burj Khalifa, Creek Beach, Creek Island and Business Bay Crossing Bridge.

All the residential units are designed with a mix of the natural materials and modern ideas and provided with large floor-to-ceiling windows, which will fill the living space with light.

Considering the highest standards of Emaar’s projects, The Cove Apartments was designed and thought out to the smallest details to provide its residents with comfortable living conditions and let everyone feel safe and relaxed at home. Residents could use various top-class amenities inside and outside the complex.

All the residents will get access to great choice of leisure and entertainment venues, shopping and dining outlets, various outdoor playgrounds for children and activities.

About Company

The founders of our company are professional investors with many years of expertise. They’ve been using the services of different real estate agencies for many years, so they've studied the real estate market of Dubai, Gulf states, the USA, Brasil, Uruguay, Argentine, the UK, Russia, and the CIS countries. It’s let them form their own methodology and vision — and bring their ideas to life.

Our mission is to provide our customers with A-level service, ultimate comfort, and security while adressing their every need as well as to guarantee the result that exceeds the expectations of our clients.More than 10 years of experience our founders and partners have made it possible to solve any task you’ve got in real estate of Dubai and Gulf states.

We offer free consultations on ways to get a residence permit in Dubai, on ways to open a bank account, corporate bodies’ registration, and other business-related topics.

TopLevel stands out providing free consultations on ways to get a residence permit and other business related questions. We are partners of many developers in Dubai which brings exclusive terms of cooperation to our clients.

FAQ

What are the stages of buying property in Dubai?

Buying property in Dubai takes place in several stages:

  • selection of a suitable facility;

  • conclusion of the contract;

  • transfer of the deposit to a seller (5-25%);

  • home maintenance contract;

  • registration in the name of the new owner (this stage is usually the one when the final settlement is made);

  • getting ownership.

Is buying property in Dubai a ground for getting UAE citizenship?

No, but in case the amount of transaction exceeds USD 240,000 the investor may get the UAE residence visa. It brings certain privileges to the buyer of residential, commercial or some other application such as:

  • the right to open a bank account;

  • the right to get the driver’s license;

  • the right to do business or be employed etc.

In case of installment purchase it’s possible to get residence visa or residence permit if the object is leased and the buyer has contributed at least 50% of total amount.

What should a buyer do to secure their funds during the transaction?

In general, when buying property in Dubai, the investors use the most secure way of payment — the wire transfer into the escrow account which means the developer receives the payment after the object is leased. A competent intermediary makes it way easier for both sides performing a number of important functions including the legal support of the transaction.

Can a foreigner make an installment purchase?

Many developers provide customers with this option. The first installment is usually 10% and about 50% are payed before the construction is finished.

Can I get a mortgage in Dubai?

Yes, you can as this option is available both for the residents and for the non-residents. The main requirements are age 21-65, a good credit score, and an appropriate level of income, sufficient to carry out the payments on time. Moreover, the same object can be purchased in installments and in a mortgage simultaneously.

Do I have to use the services of real estate agents? Can I conduct a transaction with a developer on my own?

Real estate agents accompany every transaction of sale and purchase of premises in Dubai. This guarantees the safety of transactions, the protection of interests of the investor, and the compliance with the laws of the country.
